Piper's Pups

Located just outside of Cincinnati, we specialize in mid-size whoodles. A whoodle is a cross breed of a Poodle and a Wheaten Terrier. Whoodles come in a variety of colors and are very loyal to their owners. We currently have 2 litters a year. If you are interested, please head over to our contact page for more information on reserving a spot from our next litter.

Why a Whoodle?

  • Family Friendly
  • Great for all ages!
  • No Shedding
  • Toss the lint roller!
  • Hypoallergenic
  • Sneeze no more!
  • Playful
  • Hope you like to play fetch!
